timeline.message: Refactor: Move the custom endpoints in the action package.
refactor: Create controllers for each custom endpoint.
refactor: Remove CustomEndpointManager from common project
refactor: Only have the CustomEndpoint class.
Rename CustomEndpoint to CustomFunctionAction and move to action package.

timeline.bodyText: In ResponseStatusException, the message parameter in @Nullable. We should use .orElse(null) here so that the default message for the HttpStatus will be used by the exception.
timeline.author: gkillough

timeline.bodyText: For the sake of consistency, it might be nice to wrap the List<LabelValueSelectOption> in an object.
timeline.author: gkillough

timeline.bodyText: It might be nice to wrap the List<ProviderProject>.
timeline.author: gkillough

timeline.bodyText: I'm working backwards here, but we might want to rethink content being a List. It adds one more step to the controller for enforcing the pattern of an API always returning a JSON Object.
timeline.author: gkillough

replies.bodyText: We need to change the corresponding javascript code for those fields to expect an object and rather than an array. I will look into it.
replies.author: psantos1113

replies.bodyText: Maybe a follow-up PR then, but we could definitely prepare the actions for that change.
replies.author: gkillough

replies.bodyText: I have created a new branch ps_function_select_options for the comments because this PR functions with the UI as is.  I will need to make UI changes to update UI fields to render options properly.
replies.author: psantos1113

timeline.bodyText: Does this inherit the @RequestMapping from the sub-class?
timeline.author: gkillough

replies.bodyText: yes it does.  The PostMapping just makes the controller accept post to the path in the RequestMapping defined in the sub-class that implements this abstract class.
replies.author: psantos1113

timeline.message: refactor: Have the ResponseFactory set message default to null.
refactor: Create response objects for the select options.
refactor: Change the custom functions using lists to return objects.
refactor: Fix the email address selection and enforce an options field is JSON.

Merge pull request #1160 from blackducksoftware/ps_function_select_options

Update the select options to use an object instead of List<type>
